name: Orpheus
description:
A school project based of Orpheus's myth

You must save Eurydice, killed by a snake, explore through the hell and fight against Hades and theirs soldiers.

Orpheus is platformer project for 3rd art license.

[url][https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SLCWUb7HVc8&ab_channel=BlueFlames/url]

Orpheus is weak and for defend himself he need his lyre for fighting all differents ennemies
His lyre has particularity, it can create sounds into reality, sounds will bounce on obstacle and make damage to enemies.More the bullet bounce, more you make damage to differents boss.



For save Eurydice you will be able to cross 5 levels of Hell :
- Averne Lake, who came spirit in hell
- Styx River
- Lament Forest
- Tartaros
- and Elyseeum

Fight differents boss and resolve traps across levels, win against Hades and save Eurydice


Controls :

- Direction Key/QSDZ/Joystick - Move

- Backspace/E - Interact

- Left Mouse - Shoot

- UP key/Z/Joystick - Jump
